description:
Mirai and Shizuka practice hard for the 765 Production audition. The auditions for the new project have been going smoothly, and Tsubasa decides to become an idol. 35 girls have already passed the auditions and begun their lessons. The day of the final audition arrives. After the interview, Mirai and Shizuka move on to the stage audition, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Auditions Are the Doorway to Dreams
夢のとびらはオーディション
